data.title: How much do Nikon Research Corp employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Nikon Research Corp is estimated to be approximate $90,945 per year. The majority pay is between $80,108 to $102,746 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Nikon Research Corp salary, Nikon Research Corp pay rate, and more.
data.text:
1. How much does Nikon Research Corp in the United States pay?

Nikon Research Corp pays its employees an average of $90,945 per year. The average salary at Nikon Research Corp range from $80,108 to $102,746 per year.

2. Do Nikon Research Corp employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Nikon Research Corp is lesser than Performance Dynamics Company Performance Dynamics Research. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Nikon Research Corp is $102,746 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Performance Dynamics Company Performance Dynamics Research is $129,060 per year.
